website_summaries.verdict: This faux-sandstone fountain gets high marks for its soothing sound and attractive looks.
pros: Comes in several different sizes and configurations
Three water levels, with halogen bulbs lighting the bottom two
cons: Some reports of problems with splashing

customer_reviews.title: Chance to avoid a real on-going problem
customer_reviews.text: In addition to the leaks, cleaning is very difficult, due to the need to drain for cleaning. In order to clean, one must lift and turn over the fountain with water inside. Pump, not stocked by Lamps Plus, is a continuous problem. Lights do not function unless pump is running.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fountain, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to distract from the sound of air-conditioning units near my deck. It doesn’t drown them out, but it does provide a good, loud foreground noise to mask them a bit. The foundation is really pleasant to look at. At night the bulbs send shimmering waves of light upwards, almost like a fireplace. I was also really pleased with the vendor. One of the lights didn’t work when the fountain arrived and they worked with me (through the Amazon email system) to figure out the problem, and quickly sent me a replacement lighting harness, which was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: J. Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sounds wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: We have a much bigger stone fountain with a similar design in our garden From Fountain World that cost 5 times what this was. We wanted a smaller, simple fountain for our patio that also sounds like soothing water and not the "leaking dribble" some less expensive fountains may have. This fountain sounds wonderful and similar to our high-end fountain. Great quality and value. Easy to set up-my 15-year old son put it together quickly.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Not for indoor use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for indoor use and I would not recommend it for indoor use. The flow is turned as low as it can go and it still splashes all over. I have to put a towel around it which doesn’t look very good! It is also very noisy. It is in our bedroom and I don’t run it at night due to the noise. I tried putting rocks in the bottom of the bowels and it didn’t help. Putting the pump in the fountain is difficult. You have to have very tiny hands to fit it in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: K. Barber

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely positively love this. No complaints at all
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely positively love this. No complaints at all. The only reason I did not give it five stars is because you have to always unplug it from an outlet to turn it off. If it had an on and off switch on the cord I would have given it five stars
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Secrist

customer_reviews.title: Really Attractive!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, and customer service solved a "price protection" problem very quickly! Installation instructions were hard to follow, and diagrams were really small---but I got it working.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Seitz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This fountain sits by my front door in the entrance of my home. Had many compliments and it looks and sounds good. Easy to assemble and was packaged good.
customer_reviews.author: #1shopper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful foundation!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this fountain! Beautiful light weight. The lights are beautiful at night!! I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: robert bolser

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay full enough
customer_reviews.text: Runs out if water -and it holds a lot-everyday. That should not be. It must be leaking. I love the look and lights etc but it is quite a pain to fill up EVERY DAY
customer_reviews.author: jantyner

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Sorry about the photos being upside down and sideways!! I absolutely love this fountain. The sound of the water and the lites are just what I was hoping for. Very soothing and visually pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Imiloa

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Had for a co I ole months... works exactly as I wanted. Humming birds and finches seem to like as well. Evaporation low... I tip up once every 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This fountain exceeded our expectations on quality and size and appearance. We love it! It sits in our front yard and people walking by can hear the water and love the look of it. The lights at night are perfect soft amber glow - not led white light. I would recommend this fountain!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela H.

customer_reviews.title: Truly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Easy set up. One thing my three year old grandson thinks it's a water fountain to fill his cup and wash his hands while outdoors. We get lots of compliments and my neighbor across the street says it looks great at night.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this fountain
customer_reviews.text: Leaked like a sieve. Lasted 7.5 months, less than warranty. Can't locate the seller to make good on the 1 year warranty.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 fountain this summer, had problems with all of them , EXCEPT this one it works great no issues ,lights are great looks really nice at night time lit up.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good

customer_reviews.title: Good unit, needs on/off switches
customer_reviews.text: Needs an on/off for lights AND a switch to turn the pump on/off

customer_reviews.title: Great smaller fountain
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for what I wanted. Came fully assembled, only had to slip the water tube to the pump. Love the sound of the water. And the lights are a great touch at night. Doesn’t splash water out.

customer_reviews.title: awesome gift

customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and size for the price. I enjoy the water sounds and the LED light are a nice feature. Some minimal splash which I helped reduce by placing the fountain on a circular black bath mat. Overall satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this fountain and the lights my cats like it too

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I just love our fountain!! It does enhance our patio experience with the trickling sound. The set up directions were not very good- I had to use a magnifying glass to see the diagram.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fountain
customer_reviews.text: Great fountain. I have it in my home office. The water sound was very loud at first - too loud to have indoors in my opinion - and there was some minor splashing, but I found some medium sized rocks from around my property and put them under the waterfalls and now it looks even more natural and sounds just right with no splash. The photos are accurate - the colors, lighting, and size of waterfalls is right on with what I received. It's a nice, zen addition to my office. Easy setup. Holds almost one gallon of water. It would be perfect, right out of the box, for outdoors where more sound and some splash is okay.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A. Mckean

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Came in quick, packaged very well, easy to set up! So far so good! Well let you know in time how it holds up! Love it so far out of the box! Built well and heavier than I thought it would be. Feel better about it in the landscape not getting blown over.
customer_reviews.author: wes

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PARTS, NO CLEAR INSTRUCTION FOR INSTALLATION
customer_reviews.text: I tried to contact them as there are missing parts but they themselves passed the phone to each others. Finally, I had to return it. If they sell it, they should inspect and make sure things are ok before sending out to warehouse for sale. They said the instruction included, they even sent me one, but I wish I could read them. The photos and words are so tiny. Even when I use magnifying glass, I still could not understand the instruction.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia V

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this product!
customer_reviews.text: This water feature is wonderful! It is exactly what we wanted. It works great and has a very soothing sound. I would highly recommend this product. Just a side note. We use this outdoors and it works great but there a little splashing so if you use it for indoors there will be some water that will splash on your floor. Very little though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: At this price we weren't expecting to be bowled over and we weren't.
customer_reviews.text: At this price we weren't expecting to be bowled over and we weren't. Looks pretty, but it is not perfect. It must leak water, because my husband has to fill it with half a bucket every day. Also only one of the lights worked. We added our own on the ground to shine onto it. But ll in all, it looks nice.

customer_reviews.title: Peaceful
